short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relive the nostalgia of classic NES games directly in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of nostalgia with the NES Emulator Chrome Extension! 🎮 

This sleek, modern extension allows you to play your favorite classic Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) games right from your browser. Rediscover the magic of retro gaming with ease and efficiency! 🚀

🌟 Features:

🕹️ Play NES Games: Upload and play NES ROMs from your collection. Experience the thrill of old-school gaming on your browser with perfect authenticity.

⚡ Smooth Performance: Experience lag-free, fast gameplay thanks to efficient resource management and powerful JavaScript libraries.

⚖️ Legal Notice:
This extension does not include any games or copyrighted material. It is a tool to play ROMs you legally own. By using this emulator, you acknowledge and agree that you will only use ROMs you have the right to access and use. This ensures you stay in compliance with copyright laws.

🔧 Resources Used:
jsnes: An open-source NES emulator written in JavaScript, allowing for smooth gameplay on modern browsers.
Web Audio API: Provides authentic, high-quality audio playback for your retro games.
HTML5 Canvas: Renders stunning NES graphics directly in your browser for an authentic visual experience.

📜 Important Reminder:
Please ensure that any ROM files you use are legally obtained. Respect copyright laws and make sure you’re following the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). 🌍

Enjoy your trip down memory lane with NES Emulator! ✨

🧪 Experimental & Open to Feedback
This NES Emulator is still in its experimental phase, and while it provides a fun, nostalgic gaming experience, it may still have some bugs or quirks. I'm always looking to improve and optimize the extension, so your feedback is incredibly valuable! 🛠️

If you encounter any bugs, glitches, or issues, feel free to reach out—I'm actively working to fix them and would love to hear your suggestions for new features you'd like to see! 🚀 Whether it's smoother controls, enhanced audio features, or anything else that would make your experience better, your input can help shape the future of this project. 💡

Please submit any bug reports or feature requests, and I’ll do my best to implement them in future updates! 🙏✨
